meanings.definition: A person who is grieving the death of a loved one.
meanings.sent1: The mourners gathered to remember their friend who passed away.
meanings.sent2: The church was filled with mourners paying their respects to the deceased.
meanings.sent3: The mourners shared stories of happier times to honor their loved one.
meanings.sent4: The sound of weeping from the mourners echoed through the cemetery.
meanings.sent5: The mourners' tears spoke volumes about their deep sorrow.

meanings.definition: Those who attend a funeral or memorial service to pay their respects.
meanings.sent1: Many mourners wore black clothing at the funeral.
meanings.sent2: The mourners placed flowers on the casket as a final goodbye.
meanings.sent3: The mourners quietly filed into the chapel to honor the deceased.
meanings.sent4: The solemn faces of the mourners reflected the somber occasion.
meanings.sent5: The presence of the mourners provided comfort to the grieving family.

meanings.definition: People who express sorrow or sadness over a loss.
meanings.sent1: The mourners shared hugs and words of comfort with each other.
meanings.sent2: Tears streamed down the faces of the mourners as they said goodbye.
meanings.sent3: Despite the rain, the mourners stood together in solidarity.
meanings.sent4: The mourners' sorrow was palpable in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to support the mourners during their time of need.
